idp_parental_controls_password.lang_idp_parental_controls_password_pwd_: Parental controls allow you to limit when your children can get online and the websites they can see. To use parental controls, first create a password.
idp_parental_controls_password.lang_idp_parental_controls_password_qa_t: Enter a secret question and answer. These will be used if you forget your password and need to reset it.
idp_parental_controls_password.lang_idp_parental_controls_password_errm: Please enter a valid password. Valid characters are A-Z, a-z, 0-9
The Secret question and Answer cannot be blank!
